item1.name: James Wilson
item1.content: The process was seamless. From the first enquiry to the arrival of my G-Wagon in London, Gulf Star Automotive handled everything with absolute professionalism.

item2.name: Ahmed Al-Sayed
item2.content: Trusted partner for all my export needs. Their inspection reports are detailed and honest. Recommended for anyone looking to import cars from Dubai.

item3.name: Elena Rodriguez
item3.content: Transparent pricing and express documentation. They make global car export feel like a local purchase. Excellent service!

hero.title: Driving Global Automotive Trade
hero.subtitle: Gulf Star Automotive FZC is a licensed international vehicle export company based in Dubai, UAE. We facilitate cross-border automotive trade with comprehensive logistics, compliance, and documentation services.

overview.title: Company Overview
overview.description: Gulf Star Automotive FZC operates as a full-service vehicle export facilitator, connecting international buyers with premium automotive inventory from the UAE market. Our operations encompass procurement, inspection, export documentation, customs clearance, and global logistics coordination.

mission.title: Mission
mission.content: To establish Gulf Star Automotive as the most reliable and efficient vehicle export partner for international buyers, delivering transparent processes, regulatory compliance, and end-to-end logistics solutions.

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: To become the leading automotive export platform connecting Middle East markets with global buyers through technology-driven operations and uncompromising service standards.

leadership.title: Executive
leadership.subtitle: Our management team brings decades of combined experience in international trade, automotive logistics, and export compliance.

global.title: Export
global.subtitle: We facilitate vehicle exports to major markets across six continents with established logistics partnerships and customs expertise.

trust.title: Export
trust.subtitle: Our structured approach ensures regulatory compliance and transparent operations at every stage.

inspection.title: Vehicle Inspection
inspection.desc: 120-point mechanical and cosmetic assessment with detailed reporting.

documentation.title: Export Documentation
documentation.desc: Complete preparation of customs declarations, certificates of origin, and shipping documents.

logistics.title: Logistics Coordination
logistics.desc: Secure transportation, container loading, and international freight management.

compliance.title: Compliance Assurance
compliance.desc: Adherence to destination country import regulations and safety standards.

about.title: About Us - Gulf Star Automotive FZC | International Vehicle Export
about.description: Gulf Star Automotive FZC is a licensed vehicle export company in Dubai, UAE. We provide comprehensive export services including logistics, compliance, and documentation for international automotive trade.

hero.title: World-Class
hero.subtitle: Comprehensive export solutions tailored to your needs. From procurement to delivery, we handle every detail with precision.

sourcing.title: Vehicle Sourcing
sourcing.desc: Access to exclusive off-market listings and direct dealer networks.

inspection.title: Premium Inspection
inspection.desc: Detailed 120-point mechanical and cosmetic reports for total peace of mind.

logistics.title: Global Logistics
logistics.desc: Insured land, sea, and air freight options to any destination worldwide.

customs.title: Customs Clearance
customs.desc: Expert handling of all export documentation and clearance procedures.
